name: Moon Music 좋은 음악
description: The newest and hits of kpop music

name: MapoFM
description: FM 100.7MHz 주파수로 마포 · 서대문 지역을 방송권역으로 하는 공동체라디오방송입니다. 지역공동체형성, 지방자치, 지역문화발전 및 미디어민주주의를 목적으로 2005년 9월 26일 개국했습니다.

name: CBS 표준FM
description: Less Talk, More Music! 좋은 음악을 마음껏 들을 수 있는 채널, CBS 음악 FM 공식

name: Gugak FM
description: Gugak FM is a South Korean radio broadcasting station specializing in Korean traditional music (gugak) and culture. Its coverage extends through Seoul, Gyeonggi-do, and Jeollado, and Gyeongsang, and Gangwon Province.

name: TBS eFM
description:
24-Hour Foreign Language Radio in Seoul, Korea 101.3MHz
서울시 교통방송에서 운영하는 24시간 종합편성 외국어라디오 방송!

name: EBS
description:
As the major educational television and radio network in Korea, the Korean Education Broadcasting System (EBS) has been making a great contribution to improve and develop lifelong and democratic education. EBS vigorously responds to the ever-changing media environment by fostering diversified services in different media platforms, such as TV, radio, Internet, and mobile devices. It also takes the lead in the digital N-Screen industry without restrictions in time and space.
In order to become the world’s best educational media group, all the executives and staff members of EBS continue to move forward with changes and innovation.

name: Seoul Community Radio
description: Independent Underground Radio. Made in Seoul.Seoul's first independent audio platform for freeform creative multi-culture. Local talent, global vibes, 24/7

name: FRED FILM RADIO
description: FRED Film Radio - the only multi lingual online radio station that brings you the insight on film festivals and film events all around the world!

name: BBS FM
description: 사바세계 중생의 가슴속에 영원히 지지 않는 연꽃을 피우기 위해 태어난 불교 방송

name: PBC Radio
description: 가톨릭 종합 매스컴 PBC 평화방송 공식

name: AFN The Eagle Yongsan
description: American Forces Network Korea broadcasts news, information and entertainment on radio and television to more than 60,000 Department of Defense servicemembers, civilians and their families serving in the Republic of Korea.

name: YTN News FM
description: 미주 YTN FM이 출범해 이제 미국에서도 YTN FM 방송을 실시간으로 들을 수 있게 됐습니다. 미국 내 교민들이 가장 많이 사는 지역에 한국과 미국, 전세계 뉴스를 매시간 전달합니다.

name: GFN Gwangju English Station
description: GFN FM is an english FM radio channel that is serviced in Gwangju and Yeosu, South Korea.

name: MBC 라디오
description: MBC 라디오의 공식트위터입니다. 웬만하면 본방사수, 놓쳤다면 팟캐스트

name: 국방FM
description: 국방FM(國防FM)은 대한민국 국방부에서 관할하고 있는 라디오 방송국이다.

name: SBS 파워FM
description: SBS Power FM (SBS 파워FM) is a broadcast radio station in Seoul, South Korea, providing Top 40 Adult Contemporary Pop and Rock music.
